data.title: How Decades of Networking Put Penny Mordaunt in Reach of Power
data.meta_description: The Conservative leadership race is entering a crucial week. Penny Mordaunt hopes her years of grassroots activism are about to pay off.
data.text:
The Conservative leadership race is entering a crucial week. Penny Mordaunt hopes her years of grassroots activism are about to pay off.

Follow us at @BloombergUK and on Facebook, and wrap up your day with The Readout newsletter with Allegra Stratton.

Ten days before Boris Johnson 's resignation kicked off a ferocious context to succeed him, Penny Mordaunt was doing what she has been doing for decades: putting in the hours building support among Conservative Party members and donors.
